title: 13  Sergi Petrovich Burylin, Industry, 1930
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">13  
Designed by Sergi Petrovich Burylin (Russian, 1876–1942)  
Manufactured by Great Ivanovo-Voznesensk Textile Mill (Russia )  
Industry  
1930  
Cotton, combined twill weave; probably screen-printed; 9 × 17.3 cm (3 1/2 × 6 3/4 in.)  
Harriott A. Fox and Mrs. Siegfried G. Schmidt endowments, 1993.29

</section><section id="figures">Sergi Petrovich Burylin, Industry, 1930.
